# effedtive STL iterator
	void remove_if(_Pr1 _Pred)
		{	// erase each element satisfying _Pr1
		iterator _Last = end();
		for (iterator _First = begin(); _First != _Last; )
			if (_Pred(*_First))
				_First = erase(_First);
			else
				++_First;
		}
